data.subject:
选出适当的词语填空。

data.analysis: donate和contribute均可表示“捐献”，后面均可接to。表示捐钱或衣物时，二者可互换使用。donate 一般表示捐钱和献血。只用作及物动词。contribute主要指“贡献”，通常指贡献财力、物力、智力等。此外，contribute还可表示“促成”、“起作用”、“投稿”的意思。

data.subject:
根据汉语，写出单词的正确形式。

In practice it is difficult for the Vice-President to exercise his ### (权力).
data.analysis: authority ① 权力；当权 ② 官 方；当局 ③ (正式的) 许可；授权 ④ 权威人士；专家；泰斗

data.subject:
在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

As ### (indicate) in the picture, theadventurer can find a better and more rewarding way to achieve his goal.

在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

There’s the boom ### TV programmes showing people how they can change their looks.
data.analysis: boom in ……的繁荣

data.subject:
在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

I thought he had applied for hundreds of jobs, but ### (apparent) he is still out of work.

在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

A lot of evidence indicates that oily fish, as distinct ### fatty meat, has a beneficial effect.
data.analysis: as distinct from sth 与某事物完全不同

data.subject:
在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

 It is lucky we booked a room, or we would have nowhere ### (stay) now.
data.analysis: nowhere to do sth 没有做某事的地方

data.subject:
在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

She pushed her way to the driver and got back her lost luggage ### (thankful).

在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

As children, we thought this was crazy, and it would never have occurred to us ### (deny) Papa a request.
data.analysis: it occurs to sb to do sth 某人想起做某事

data.subject:
在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

When the inspector extended his hand to greet the immigration agent, he slipped ### the freshly oiled surface.
data.analysis: slip on sth 在某物上滑倒

data.subject:
选出适当的单词或短语填空。

Teaming up with the native speakers helped me better ______ their language.
data.analysis: 表示理解语言、词汇或文章等时只能用understand，不能用grasp

data.subject:
选出适当的单词或短语填空。

An Italian tried to explain to the customs officer ______ sign language.
data.analysis: by means of (正式用语) 借助；依靠；by no means 决不；一点也不；by all means 尽一切办法；务必；(表示答应) 当然可以

data.subject:
选出适当的单词或短语填空。

It is ______ clear what the president can do to end the strike (罢工).
data.analysis: by means of (正式用语) 借助；依靠；by no means 决不；一点也不；by all means 尽一切办法；务必；(表示答应) 当然可以

data.subject:
选出适当的单词或短语填空。

My brakes are not working properly. Can you take a look at them? — Yes, ______ !
data.analysis: by means of (正式用语) 借助；依靠；by no means 决不；一点也不；by all means 尽一切办法；务必；(表示答应) 当然可以

data.subject:
选出适当的短语动词填空。

It is apparent from scientific studies that rainforests can ______ heat from the sun and adjust the climate.
data.analysis: take in ① 吸入；收留 ② 理解 ③ 欺骗 ④ 包括

data.subject:
选出适当的短语动词填空。

These seagulls ______ small sea creatures such as fish and shrimp.
data.analysis: live on ① 继续活着；继续存在 ② 以……为主食；靠(……钱) 生活

data.subject:
选出适当的短语动词填空。

Walking alone in the dark, the boy ______ his courage by means of whistling.

选出适当的短语动词填空。

A good many people elect to ______ their vacant (空置的) apartments to earn a living.
data.analysis: hire out 出租

data.subject:
选出适当的短语动词填空。

It was several minutes before I ______ what the conductor was saying.

根据所给汉语及提示，完成句子。

The transport ministry are working to create what they hope will be the best ### (交通工具) in the 21st century.

根据所给汉语及提示，完成句子。

From a different angle, persons in Asian cultures view silence as a sign of respect, particularly to an elder or a person ### (当权的).

根据所给汉语及提示，完成句子。

We only had $100 and apparently that was ### (离……差得远) enough to buy a new computer. (nowhere)

根据所给汉语及提示，完成句子。

The Center for ### (教育改革) says the United States has 67 public "cyberschools”.

根据所给汉语及提示，完成句子。

An agreement seems to be impossible because ### (大多数) people in the federal authority are against it.

我没有想到汤姆会被选为学生会主席。

### that Tom would be elected chairman of the Students' Union.

上星期一，我们上语文课的时候老师突然滑倒了。

Last Monday, when we were having our Chinese class ###.
data.answer: the teacher suddenly slipped and fell

data.subject:
老实说，意大利语考卷尽管有些难度，但对我来说不难。

Frankly speaking, the Italian tests were ###.
data.answer: not hard for me despite some difficulty

data.subject:
游泳是我最喜爱的运动。保持身体健康的方法，没什么比得上游泳了。

Swimming is my favorite sport. ###.
data.answer: Nothing compares with swimming as a means of keeping fit

data.subject:
应多给我们机会去运用所学知识，从而更好地理解这些知识。

We should be given more opportunities to use ###.
data.answer: what we’ve learned in order to better grasp it
